titles.title: The Lord Is Blessing Me Right Now

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Lord, is blessing me right now.
The Lord, is blessing me right now.
He woke me up this morning, and started me on my way
The Lord, is blessing me right now.
The Lord, is filling me right now (2x)
He woke me up this morning, and started me on my way
The Lord, is filling me right now.
The Lord, is teaching me right now (2x)
He woke me up this morning, and started me on my way
The Lord, is teaching me right now.
The Lord, is trying me right now (2x)
He woke me up this morning, and started me on my way
